Home.manageAndAnalyze: Manage and analyze all your advertising campaigns in one unified dashboard. Gain insights, track performance, and optimize results effortlessly.
Home.trackingDataDescription: Find all analytics tags and tracking services on any website.
Home.unifiedDashboardDescription: Fetch data from Google, Meta, Microsoft, and more in one interface.
Home.multipleAccountsDescription: Save multiple ad accounts and switch between saved metrics seamlessly.
Home.supportedPlatformsDescription: Seamlessly Track Data And Integrate With:
Home.ctaTitle: Ready To Transform Your Advertising Strategy?

Footer.tagline: Manage and analyze all your advertising campaigns in one unified dashboard.
Footer.rightsReserved: Â© {year} Advertising Analytics Dashboard. All rights reserved.

Account.accountInfoDescription: Manage your profile information and saved queries here.
Account.savedQueriesDescription: Access your saved queries for different services

Contact.introText: Have questions? Contact us to see how we can help your business thrive.
Contact.successDescription: We've received your message and will get back to you soon.
Contact.errorDescription: There was an error sending your message.

Privacy.introText: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
Privacy.informationPersonalInfo: Personal Information: When you create an account, we collect details such as your name, email address, and any other data you provide during registration.
Privacy.informationUsageData: Usage Data: We track how you interact with our website, including the services you use, the pages you visit, and your preferences, to enhance your experience.
Privacy.informationAdPlatformData: Ad Platform Data: If you connect your ad accounts, we access campaign performance metrics, but we never modify or interact with your ad campaigns.
Privacy.useInfoItem1: Provide access to our platform and its features.
Privacy.useInfoItem3: Communicate updates, promotional offers, and support-related information.
Privacy.useInfoItem4: Maintain the security and integrity of your data.
Privacy.dataProtectionDescription: We implement industry-standard security measures to safeguard your personal information and ad platform data. Your data is encrypted and stored securely, and we regularly update our systems to address emerging security risks.
Privacy.sharingDescription: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with trusted third-party services only when necessary for operation, and these parties are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.
Privacy.rightItem1: Access and update your personal information.
Privacy.rightItem2: Delete your account and associated data.
Privacy.rightItem3: Opt-out of marketing communications by updating your preferences.
Privacy.changesDescription: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
Privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please

Terms.introText: Welcome to our Advertising Analytics Dashboard. Please review these Terms of Service carefully before using our platform.
Terms.acceptanceDescription: By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our platform.
Terms.userResponsibilitiesDescription: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
Terms.modificationsDescription: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time without prior notice.
Terms.limitationDescription: Our dashboard is provided on an 'as is' basis. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
Terms.changesDescription: We may update these Terms of Service periodically. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
Terms.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please

Dashboard.campaignsDescription: Your best performing campaigns this month

TrackingDataPage.title: Tracking Data
TrackingDataPage.description: Enter your website URL to identify all tracking tags and analytics services on your site.

TrackingDataQueries.instructionsDescription: Enter your website URL and select from your saved queries or create one.
TrackingDataQueries.selectPlaceholder: Select a saved query or create new
TrackingDataQueries.resultsDescription: Tracking services found on your website
TrackingDataQueries.noResults: Enter a URL and click Analyze to see results

TrackingDataResultsSection.resultsWillAppear: Results will appear here once analysis is complete.

GoogleAnalyticsPage.title: Google Analytics
GoogleAnalyticsPage.description: Connect to your Google Analytics account to view your website analytics.

GoogleAnalyticsQueries.instructionsDescription: Enter your Property ID, select your date range and create or select an existing query.
GoogleAnalyticsQueries.selectPlaceholder: Select a saved query or create new
GoogleAnalyticsQueries.resultsDescription: Google Analytics data for the selected period
GoogleAnalyticsQueries.noResults: Enter your Property ID and date range, then click Analyze to see results

GoogleAnalyticsResultsSection.resultsWillAppear: Results will appear here once analysis is complete.
